conbody.p: (a) Contracting officers shall ensure contract actions for cloud-related requirements reflect the Technology Business Management taxonomy at AFARS Appendix HH â€“ Cloud Computing and follow the guidance provided at AFARS 5111.106 unless the requiring activity provides a waiver approved by ECMA (armycloud@army.mil).
